TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IRemotingFormatter, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class BinaryFormatter Implements IRemotingFormatter
type BinaryFormatter = class interface IRemotingFormatter interface IFormatter

summary.span: 以二进制格式序列化和反序列化对象或连接对象的整个图形。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, in binary format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 类实现了 接口以支持远程过程调用（Rpc），并实现 接口（由 继承）以支持对象图形的序列化。The and classes implement the interface to support remote procedure calls (RPCs), and the interface (inherited by the ) to support serialization of a graph of objects. 类还支持与 对象的 Rpc，而不使用 功能。The class also supports RPCs with objects, without using the functionality. 在 Rpc 过程中， 接口允许指定两个单独的对象图：要序列化的对象的关系图，以及一个包含标头对象数组的表，这些标头对象用于传递有关远程函数调用的信息（例如，事务 ID 或方法签名）。During RPCs, the interface allows the specification of two separate object graphs: the graph of objects to serialize, and an additional graph that contains an array of header objects that convey information about the remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature). 使用 分为两个不同的部分的 Rpc：方法调用（发送到包含所调用方法的远程对象的服务器）和方法响应（使用被调用方法中的状态和响应信息从服务器发送到客户端）。RPCs that use the separate into two distinct parts: method calls, which are sent to the server with the remote object that contains the method called, and method responses, which are sent from the server to the client with the status and response information from the called method. 在方法调用的序列化过程中，对象图的第一个对象必须支持 接口。During serialization of a method call the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要反序列化方法调用，请将 方法与 参数一起使用。To deserialize a method call, use the method with the parameter. 远程处理基础结构使用 委托生成支持 接口的对象。The remoting infrastructure uses the delegate to produce an object that supports the interface. 当 调用 委托时，它将返回远程对象的 URI 以及正在调用的方法。When the invokes the delegate, it returns the URI of the remote object with the method that is being called. 返回的关系图中的第一个对象支持 接口。The first object in the graph returned supports the interface. 方法响应的序列化过程与方法调用的序列化过程相同，不同之处在于对象图的第一个对象必须支持 接口。The serialization procedure for a method response is identical to that of a method call, except the first object of the object graph must support the interface. 若要反序列化方法响应，请使用 方法。To deserialize a method response, use the method. 为了节省时间，在方法调用期间，不会将有关调用方对象的详细信息发送到远程对象。To save time, details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 这些详细信息是从原始方法调用获取的，该方法调用会传递到 参数中的 方法。These details are instead obtained from the original method call, which is passed to the method in the parameter. 方法返回的关系图中的第一个对象支持 接口。The first object in the graph returned by the method supports the interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用二进制序列化对不受信任的数据进行反序列化可能会导致安全风险。Using binary serialization to deserialize untrusted data can lead to security risks. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## 不成对代理项Unpaired Surrogates 二进制序列化会丢失任何未成对的代理项字符。Any unpaired surrogate characters are lost in binary serialization. 例如，以下字符串在两个 `Test` 单词之间包含一个高代理项 Unicode 字符 `(\ud800`）：For example, the following string contains a high surrogate Unicode character `(\ud800`) in between the two `Test` words: `Test\ud800Test` 序列化之前，字符串的字节数组如下所示：Before serialization, the byte array of the string is as follows: |字节数组值Byte Array Value|字符Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|ss| |116116|tt| |5529655296|\ud800\ud800| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|ss| |116116|tt| 反序列化后，高位代理项 Unicode 字符将丢失：After deserialization, the high surrogate Unicode character is lost: |字节数组值Byte Array Value|字符Character| |----------------------|---------------| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|ss| |116116|tt| |8484|TT| |101101|ee| |115115|ss| |116116|tt| ## Examples [!code-cpp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CPP/binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/CS/binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BinaryFormatterClass Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/BinaryFormatterClass Example/VB/binaryformatter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用给定的代理项选择器和流上下文来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a given surrogate selector and streaming context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化新的 `BinaryFormatter`，用于序列化或反序列化指定 中的对象。Initializes a new `BinaryFormatter` for serialization or deserialization of objects from the specified . 序列化或反序列化进程使用指定的 搜索注册为要反序列化的对象类型的代理项。The serialization or deserialization process uses the specified to search for surrogates that are registered for the object types you want to deserialize. 代理项是对特定类的对象进行序列化和反序列化的帮助器。Surrogates are helpers that serialize and deserialize objects of specific classes. 默认 无法处理从 派生的对象的序列化，以便进行远程处理。The default cannot handle the serialization of objects that derive from the for remoting purposes. 在远程处理情况下，指定 将派生自 的对象替换为由指定代理项选择器序列化的 对象。In a remoting situation the specified replaces the object derived from with a object that is serialized by the specified surrogate selector. 因此，如果要使用远程对象，请将 `selector` 参数设置为 的实例。Therefore, if you want to use remote objects, set the `selector` parameter to an instance of . 如果不需要代理项，请将 `selector` 参数设置为 `null`。If you do not need surrogates, set the `selector` parameter to be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供了一个枚举，用于描述给定序列化流的源和目标，以及用于序列化以保留该上下文和其他调用方定义的上下文的方法。The provides an enumeration that describes the source and the destination for a given serialized stream, as well as a way for serialization to retain that context and an additional caller-defined context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在方法调用期间，不会将有关调用方对象的详细信息发送到远程对象。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 而是从原始方法调用获取这些详细信息，该方法调用将传递到 `methodCallMessage` 参数中的当前方法。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 为了成功进行反序列化，流中的当前位置必须位于对象图的开头。In order for deserialization to succeed the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标头仅用于特定的远程处理应用程序。Headers are used only for specific remoting applications. 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用该方法;只有直接调用方才需要具有 权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用，请不要使用此方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分受信任的方案中，改用 。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任的情况下， 比 提供更好的性能。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 若要成功进行反序列化，流中的当前位置必须位于对象图的开头。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)]

param.span: 该 包含有关调用出处的详细信息。

span.span: The that contains details about where the call came from.

summary.span: 将对远程方法调用的响应从所提供的 进行反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes a response to a remote method call from the provided .

returns.span: 对远程方法调用的反序列化响应。

span.span: The deserialized response to the remote method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在方法调用期间，不会将有关调用方对象的详细信息发送到远程对象。Details about the caller object are not sent to the remote object during the method call. 而是从原始方法调用获取这些详细信息，该方法调用将传递到 `methodCallMessage` 参数中的当前方法。Instead, these details are obtained from the original method call that is passed to the current method in the `methodCallMessage` parameter. 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用该方法;只有直接调用方才需要具有 权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用，请不要使用此方法。Do not use this method if your code can be called from partially trusted code. 在部分受信任的方案中，改用 。In partially trusted scenarios, use instead. 在完全信任的情况下， 比 提供更好的性能。In full trust scenarios, provides better performance than . 若要成功进行反序列化，流中的当前位置必须位于对象图的开头。For successful deserialization, the current position in the stream must be at the beginning of the object graph. [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-method-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-method-note.md)]

span.span: The supports seeking, but its length is 0.

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
To provide serialization services.
